steps.step: Step with your right foot toward 6:00 into a neutral bow while pinning your opponent's right hand to your chest with your left hand. Simultaneously execute a hammering inward to your opponent's right elbow.
Execute a palm heel to your opponent's right arm, pinning their arm to their body.
Pivot into a forward bow while executing a thrusting heel palm behind your opponent's right year
Execute a step-through vertical to your opponent's groin.
Step down into a neutral bow as you execute a inward horizontal elbow to your opponent's left jaw.
